title: Recommended
text: The Panathenaic Stadium was absolutely breathtaking. For only €5 per person I would definitely recommend going here. You get a free audio guide which is very detailed and explains a lot of the history. Also very nice to see lots of the olympic torches. If you feel up to it I would also recommend going to the very top of the stadium and walk around the upper echelon for amazing views of Athens.

title: Absolutely stunning
text:
I would recommend this to anyone visiting Athens or visiting near and around it. You can get in for just €20 or pay €30 for a multi site pass which let's you into 6 other places as well as the Acropolis itself which I would strongly recommend as it saves you money and it gives you an idea on other things to do.

On the topic of the Acropolis though it is a must visit. A short walk up to the top of the hill will show you many sights including the Theater of Dionysus. Once at the top there are many other sights apart from the Acropolis such as the Temple of Athena Nike. It also provides beautiful views of the city and the countryside around it.

I would recommend getting here early however or booking your tickets online via the official site to save both time and money as queues can easily take up to an hour. Another way to save time is to visit one of the less popular sights on the pass, buy the pass there for the same price then skip the queues later when you get to the Acropolis.

title: Nice pub
text: Very nice local pub, food is nice and a wide variety of drinks. Drinks are a bit overpriced but nice atmosphere and do show live sporting events.

title: It's a bridge
text: What did you expect from this review. It's just a bridge. I mean it's a pretty long bridge but not the longest ya know.

title: Great Restaurant
text: Really good place to visit for Italian food. Been there a couple of times now, staff always friendly and polite, great food and really nice decor and cleanly. All for a reasonable price. Strongly recommend.

title: Pretty good
text: Nice location, lot of effort put into the wax models. They changed them around a bit from the last time I went there so good to see its not always the same. Special attractions such as the Marvel section particularly good.

title: Decent
text: Had a good time, there was a 30 minute delay in our start time, however it was all sorted and everything else went smoothly

title: Average
text: Quaint little street. Cant say much for the cafes there but some of the local shops had intersting things

title: Nice aquarium
text: Lots of interactive exhibits and the staff knew their stuff. Nice wide variety of aquatic and reptillian animals
